reviewText: Great addition to Denzel Washington collection.

That a three-for-one format is a great bargain goes without saying. Especially as these are all virtually classics. Prints are
sharp, audio excellent on my three-some (I imagine an all sets). My favorite is DEVIL IN A BLUE DRESS, which has about
every dramatic element from humor to action to pathos to social comment.

Although I have all three movies on laser disk, this was a prime opportunity to upgrade to DVDs;
a great bargain and really upgrades my watching pleasure, and that's what it's all about, isn't it?
rc
I enjoyed seeing the nostalgic movies with Denzel Washington and Jennifer Beals acting.  I am proud to see such talented people in movies and how educated they are off the screen.
I brought this for a Devil in a blue dress. Don as Mouse was a Masterpiece. "If you didn't want 'em dead, why'd you leave with me." But I first watched the classic A Solider's Story.
